vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with Black & Veatch Corporation for additional construction management services associated with the construction of the Mill Creek/Peaks Branch/State-Thomas Drainage Relief Tunnel Project - Not to exceed $6,994,000.00, from $19,800,000.00 to $26,794,000.00 - Financing:  Flood Protection & Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds)
